price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߴߌ ߞߊ߫ ߛߌߟߊ߲߫ ߠߋ߬ ߞߟߋ߫ ߸ ߓߊߏ߬ ߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߒ߬ ߘߟߊߝߎ߬ ߟߴߌ ߦߋ߫ ߘߋ߲ߞߍ߫ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ( ߡߏߦߌߞߏ ) ߟߊ߫
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
